data.text: @RIHEALTH Since it appears you haven’t seen yesterdays PFIZER document release...Meet @JeanRees10 - she’s breaking it down very well for everyone. Whomever runs this account should read through the documents before posting again. https://t.co/L5DbdEvHJh

@RIHEALTH "There is no evidence."  Period.  Stop there.  Stop misleading the public into thinking that safety data exists.  You've become a pharmaceutical mouthpiece pushing experimental products as if they were well tested & by doing so, you undermine your own credibility.
@RIHEALTH I’d love to see fertility and birth data for RI.
@RIHEALTH Cumulative Analysis of Post-authorization Adverse Event Reports-Pfizer-APPENDIX 1. LIST OF ADVERSE EVENTS OF SPECIAL INTEREST see page 30 https://t.co/pMjfupVQ9O
@RIHEALTH Nobody knows what side effects are to come.
@RIHEALTH You may want to delete this post as there are thousands of tweets going viral right now with Pfizer docs proving the exact opposite of what this statement says. You are LYING.
